definition: 100 ml/one-tenth of a peck/measure for dry grain equal to one-tenth of sheng 升 or liter, or one-hundredth dou 斗
to close/to join/to fit/to be equal to/whole/together/round (in battle)/conjunction (astronomy)/1st note of pentatonic scale/old variant of 盒[he2]
according to/in accordance with/to shine/to illuminate/to reflect/to look at (one's reflection)/to take (a photo)/photo/as requested/as before

sentences.english: After the event, our staff & representatives took a group photo.
sentences.chinese: 活动完结后，一众工作人员来幅大合照。

sentences.english: We actually took five of the same shot, but all with different angle.
sentences.chinese: 我跟小趟照了五张同样地点但是不同角度的自拍合照。

sentences.english: Three of us stood in front of the stupa .
sentences.chinese: 三人站在佛塔前的合照。

sentences.english: It's the picture of our class.
sentences.chinese: 这张拼图是我们班的大合照。

sentences.english: Take picture with cute little ox .
sentences.chinese: 我与可爱的小石牛合照。

sentences.english: A picture of Adam's class hangs on the wall of his former school.
sentences.chinese: 亚当以前的学校墙上挂着他的班集体合照。

sentences.english: A sailor poses with his girlfriend during Sailors' Day in Moscow's Gorky Park. (1993)
sentences.chinese: 莫斯科的高尔基公园，一个水手与他的女朋友合照。

sentences.english: Me and Joseph Cardinal Zen Ze-kiun (The Prelate and Bishop of Hong Kong. ) at the unveiling of the portrait ceremony .
sentences.chinese: 罗卓睿与香港教区主教陈日君枢机在典礼合照。

sentences.english: Mr. Li Chi Keung, Director of MJC, has a group photo with representatives of the sponsors of the Charity Day.
sentences.chinese: 澳门赛马会董事李志强先生与一众赞助商代表合照。
我们的合照看起来怎样？

sentences.english: Group photo of some of the awardees and guests at the Donor Award Ceremony.
sentences.chinese: 部份得奖人及嘉宾合照。

sentences.english: Members of the OSHC taking photos with artists.
sentences.chinese: 职安局成员与当日演出的艺人合照。

sentences.english: Cheng and Leung said they would never be embarrassed to have their pictures taken together.
sentences.chinese: 郑伊健和梁咏琪表示不会为合照而感到尴尬。

sentences.english: Look, this is a photo of my section.
sentences.chinese: 看，这是我全组同事合照。

sentences.english: And then this picture is with Mayor Zhang who was kind enough to accompany us on our tour of Gui Ping.
sentences.chinese: 这张是与张市长的合照，他亲切地陪伴我们游览桂平。
和铁塔来张远景合照吧。

definition: to take a joint photo/group photo
to take a picture or video of oneself/to take a selfie/selfie
head-and-shoulders photo (esp. a formal one used in a passport, ID card etc)
to appear on camera/to play a role in a film
(coll.) to look alike/to be a spitting image of
to make a public display of affection

(of the sun) to shine on/to bask in (the sunshine)/to dry (clothes, grain etc) in the sun/(fig.) to expose and share (one's experiences and thoughts) on the Web (loanword from "share")/(coll.) to give the cold shoulder to
a person's face as seen from the front
